ProteinName	Cancer-related nucleoside-triphosphatase (NTPase) (EC 3.6.1.15) (Nucleoside triphosphate phosphohydrolase)
GeneName	NTPCR C1orf57
Length	190
Function	Has nucleotide phosphatase activity towards ATP, GTP, CTP, TTP and UTP. Hydrolyzes nucleoside diphosphates with lower efficiency.
